changeSet.author: niro_bb
changeSet.sql: create table deal ( id uuid primary key not null, description text, agreement_number text, agreement_date date, agreement_start_dt timestamp, availability_date date, type_id varchar(30) references deal_type (id), status_id varchar(30) references deal_status (id) not null default 'DRAFT', close_dt timestamp, create_date timestamp not null default now(), modify_date timestamp, create_user_id text, modify_user_id text, is_active boolean not null default true );
